programme.title: Spain's hard times
programme.short_synopsis: In Spain's hard times it's families who are supporting the unemployed.
programme.medium_synopsis: Pascale Harter travels to Spain for Assignment to see how families there are coping with record unemployment as the government slashes public spending to cope with its massive budget deficit.
programme.long_synopsis:
Pascale Harter is in Spain for Assignment to see how families there are coping with record unemployment as the government cuts public spending to cope with its massive budget deficit. 

As she discovers, many people are turning to their families to get them through the hard times.

You can find more information on the impact of austerity measures on economies around the world on our website - just go to bbc.com/business.
